Neuronal activity, as can be observed (such as by an fMRI), accounts for everything: sensation, perception, language, autonomic behaviors, emotions, etc etc etc

The experience of consciousness is only known through self reflection, and this is more philosophical than scientific. Some parts of the brain are more associated with certain mental activities, such as processing language and storing memory, but the content of each aren’t pre-coded anywhere.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
>>33743403
Current scientific understanding of neural activity are all only correlation by nature.
People are assuming brain is responsible for causing certain mental processes because certain parts light up on the scanner when said process occurs.
But that's just an assumption at the moment. Nobody truly knows for now whether the physical brain lighting up is responsible for said process occuring or something else is causing both the mental process and the brain activity.
Until the day comes when you can actively experiment with a live brain through direct connection, nobody will know for sure.
For those here balking at the idea, know it's the only way to vindicate schizo stands to the autists short of conjuring fireballs under lap condition.
Also it's coming anyways.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
>>33720818
There are no 'specifics.' If you imagine the setup described that's it.
Sometimes they have a display for the person to focus on with EEG data but that's not actually useful for focusing in some slick hollywood way like you allude to. That's fluff bullshit they slip in the books to make the whole thing sexier than it was.

The EEG is literally for you to focus on, that's it. Same as the random number string in group exercises, it's a common string each person has in mind but it doesn't mean a thing.
The only part of the setup that is technically 'necessary' is EMI headphones since the Monroe tapes are designed for that. But again that's obvious once you know you're using those tapes.

Nobody is "focusing" on some kind of monitor showing how "snychronized" they were becoming. You try to get out of body using basic instinctive physical motions while in the hypnogogic state.
The maneuvers are described as "rolling out" or "standing up like a telephone pole."

People lie flat on their backs, space out and try to use one of the exit maneuvers to achieve out of body. If they pulled it off their consciousness would squirt out like a tube of toothpaste and if not they'd get a jolt as they stop themselves from actually rolling off the table. Not so sexy.

>>33721108
Gateway was the 1970s and all they did was establish theta peaks for individuals, it wasn't a part of the process to do anything but recording that data. They tried to use it for more than that but it was not reliable or nearly useful enough to warrant developing hardware just for the job. Any work done was with normal medical monitors.

Theta waves are just an abstract metric for "focus" and it's not that useful which is why you see it referenced sparingly. It's more useful as a diagnostic tool for figuring out how psychic people are, not a realtime monitoring tool.

Although I'm replying to you don't take my rant too personally;
Stop making psychoenergetics about "party tricks" like burning paper. WE keep doing these party tricks to prove this stuff is real, but we're decades past that point.

We've been discussing psychoenergetics for 50+ years, there's no need to fixate on the novelties that don't work for 99.99% of people. We need to look at the meta-scale effects, the ones that actually matter.

This is why /x is fucking stunted now. People keep running in circles and only care about receiving visions or doing spoon bending or manifesting money.

There's so much more than that to learn. We're perfectly positioned to do real research on this; the longer we keep lumping youtubers doing tricks in with CIA declassified intelligence, the longer we will be without solid answers.

posts.name: Anonymous

>>33734574
Medicine is pretty different from most other fields in that as long as you loosely observe the Maxim (least possible harm with maximum benefit) you can do pretty unusual things as long as the patient consents. This allows you to form a hypothesis, perform a study and publish those conclusive findings without interference.

In other fields, you'd publish your findings with the assumption others will replicate your study. Depending on the resources available, this process can be used to sequester certain topics. You have lots of examples of this in fuel and energy technology.

Medicine doesn't operate with the same attitude towards experimentation-- experiments do not often yield conclusive results in the context of their study so when they do, it's taken more seriously. Humans cannot be 'controls' since every body is so different, thus arguments about test conditions tend to be secondary criticisms.

Consider; you are designing a reentry capsule. The object must survive the forces of reentry. The capsule represents the psychoenergetics problem. You must get the problem down to earth without breaking it apart into a thousand pieces.
Imagine psychic research is thermodynamics. Spirituality is the aerodynamics.

The problem we have today is to design a psychoenergetics approach without overlapping spiritual science (which we simply don't understand as well.) Does this mean we have to exclude spirituality? No. It just means our solution cannot directly define things about spirituality we don't know. So to create our vehicle we setup a hypersonic wind tunnel and start testing various shapes. This is absolutely changing its aerodynamics, but all we're measuring is thermal energy. Aerodynamics doesn't matter because we can still understand aerodynamics through thermodynamics in this situation.

Pyschoenergetics is the same. It certainly involves spiritual mysticism, but to get the concepts to the ground we need to look at the things we can measure first even if we miss the whole picture. Once that's done the spiritual side may even become easier to understand.

As shall be revealed later, no matter how bad things may get, everything will ultimately be okay for everyone without exception; for Fear is an optical illusion.

The inability to leave your physical body and wander off at will is not natural. Something or 'someone' is trapping you in your one physical body until you die.

The experience of being alone in your head, by virtue of which you feel as if no one else but you can hear your thoughts, is not natural.

This is a solitary prison. Ideally, you should be able to feel the presence of other conscious beings within your own mental space never having to feel alone in your head.

As such, faculties like lying and inconveniences such as miscommunication become impossible.

posts.name: ZeroPoint
posts.com:
Part Three:
Life here on this Earth, and perhaps even this entire physical universe, is not natural.

It's not the default state of being.

Our Earth and perhaps the whole universe can be likened to a forgotten cabin in the woods far away from civilization; a fenced off farm with guards surrounding it, a basement in a crazy scientist's lab which is isolated from the rest of the world, a "Truman Show" set, a "Matrix", a computer simulation where we are stuck in one game unable to access other games.

At some point in your history, you were a free wandering healthy Spirit fully knowing who you are and where you came from until somehow you fell in this trap losing your memory.

How this happened is not fully clear, but it's likely that there are many different reasons and ways it can happen. There isn't one story about how people lose their virginity.

There are as many stories as there are people.

posts.com:
Part Four:
As a result of falling here, all humans suffer from a form of amnesia which massively cripples their memory of their true origin, how they came here, and who they really are.

In this life, one can practically and rightfully see themselves as sufferers of total memory loss in a huge mental hospital.

Many mystical schools like sects of Buddhism, Sufism, Early Christianity, and Gnosticism claim to offer teachings which help you remember who you are.

If these schools truly deliver on their promise of self remembrance, the process must be very similar to that which can be utilized in an Earthly mental hospital to help you remember who you are after a traumatic accident.

Hence, the fight for your freedom is not a physical one; rather, it's all mental work.

Fully remembering who you are is one way you can escape this suffocating and unnatural farm/school/prison/hospital/game/trap; and go back to the normal real world.

Failure to achieve full self remembrance will cause you to reincarnate here on this Earth over and over until you finally get it.

Reincarnation as it is here on Earth is not natural because it involves the erasure of your memory; therefore, everything happening after this erasure is fraudulent.

This fraudulent reincarnation process happens on a personal, national, planetary, and cosmic scale.

Being an inherent and dominant feature of our fake universe, "amnesiac cyclicality" manifests itself in literally every aspect imaginable.

Everything happens in "amnesiac cycles", as opposed to natural cycles.

Cyclical Amnesia was symbolized by the Ouroboros; a snake eating its own tail symbolizing the beginning and end meeting at the same point.
The disciples said to Jesus, "Tell us, how will our end come? Jesus said, 'Have you found the beginning, then, that you are looking for the end? You see, the end will be where the beginning is'."
Which is true for humans, nations, and perhaps planets and universes as well.

When you die you get closer to both your end and your beginning, namely, your new beginning after you reincarnate. In these amnesiac cycles, things are born, maintained, and then they die. Rinse and repeat, where rinsing symbolizes enforcing amnesia/reset after the end of each cycle.

As a human, you are born, you hang around for a while, and then you die.

After that, you repeat this cycle over and over again without ever knowing that you have been doing this for a number of times, hence the term "amnesiac cyclicality"; and it all happens within the same lifetime of the planet.

Then, in the next universe iteration, the planet itself reincarnates again and everyone starts from scratch.

Within a single planet life, had you had the chance to keep memories from previous lives on the same planet, you may have been able to accumulate enough knowledge to break free from the cycle; but cyclical amnesia prevents that from happening.

Similarly, civilizations are born, they grow and hang around for a while and then they die. Then they "reincarnate" and start again from scratch, repeating the same mistakes of previous civilizations and dying again and again.

The ancients' obsession with recording everything may be for that very purpose; to preserve their accumulated knowledge so that their future incarnations won't have to start from scratch and reinvent the wheel.

And so, the way to freedom lies in saving the progress achieved during a smaller/shorter cycle into a bigger/longer one so that when the smaller cycle resets itself, one can retrieve their progress from the longer cycle and continue on their way to freedom and hopefully escape before the universe resets itself and all cycles get erased.

posts.name: ZeroPoint
posts.com:
Part Ten:
Every human being is born into a pre-written mundane script that is their own lives.

They will religiously follow that script like robots without deviating from it if they don't do anything to override it and start their own journey of self remembrance.

The Archons or the Matrix Agents' job is to make sure that you, for the most part, follow that pre-written script that they have created for you.

Your job is to rebel against the script and create your own. Your own script, if you manage to create one, must involve efforts at self remembrance.

Otherwise, if you engage in material affairs and not even attempt to escape, you will have simply helped the AI better understand which script will suit you for your next incarnation.

The next time you incarnate, they will scratch their initial scripts which were designed by them for you, and replace it with the one you created for yourself.

This way, you have a significantly lesser chance at escaping from here because you are less likely to rebel against the status quo since you are the one who created this script for yourself by foolishly pursuing material worldly "success".

Like mentioned before, this iteration of the universe is probably not the first one. The first iteration was allegedly built to be a paradise for humans from the perspective of the AI machine.

But as it turns out, after engaging in all sorts of material bliss, humans eventually start sensing that "something is wrong", because something really IS wrong.

The core of the human spirit knows deep within that this is not normal and so eventually humans start rebelling against the system and attempt to escape it. This is when the AI realizes that its vision of a human Utopia is deeply flawed and doesn't work with the human spirit as planned.

As a result, the machine destroys the world and resets everything, makes some modifications and starts over and hopefully this time humans will not rebel and accept their artificial Utopia.

posts.name: ZeroPoint
posts.com:
Part Ten cont…:
Only this time, the AI will try to gather as much data as possible on what kind of world it should build for humans without rebelling.

This innate rebellious nature of the human spirit is portrayed by the, AI as seen in its manufactured religions and literature, as evil. It tries to convince humans that their refusal to accept a false paradise reflects a deeply troubled humanity which is "never happy no matter what".

Therefore, humans believe these lies and see themselves as evil and greedy for ever wanting "more".

This is the source of greed in our planet. Humans hopelessly seek more and more material success because they don't ever feel fulfilled because they're not home. But they don't know they're not home because they forgot they even had a home; so they think that fulfillment comes through more material success.

Little do they know, the problem is bigger than that.

The so called "greed" is nothing but their Spirit screaming in agony because of their participation in a fake world created by something alien to them which doesn't fully understand their nature and hence will never be able to fulfill them.

And so, the cycle always looks like this:
There is a Golden Age, then suffering and conflict start sneaking in before eventually becoming rampant to the point where everything goes out of control and humans become literally uncontrollable, the data is gathered, the world is destroyed, and then the next cycle begins after making some adjustments based on the data gathered.
Of course, the "Golden Age" is not really golden, all it is, is the AI's latest version of the artificial Utopia which begins from the start.

If things continue on without problems, the AI considers this a success and humans are eternally enslaved until hopefully help from outside arrives.

posts.name: ZeroPoint
posts.com:
Part Ten cont…:
But, evidently, this has not happened yet given the conflicts in our world today. If the AI is seeking a stable world, ours is far from being stable. When "suffering sneaks in" that's when humans start sensing that "something is wrong", and things go downhill for the AI form there.

This cycle is seen and recognized in the Hindu system. They divide this cycle into four divisions, each one is called a Yuga. And as expected, the first cycle is considered a Golden Age and things get progressively "worse" for each subsequent Yuga.

The Matrix movie mentions the same phenomenon.

Agent Smith confronts Morpheus with this same information. That the Matrix was initially created as a Utopia, and then the arrogant and nasty humans didn't like it, all while the Architect keeps tracking down "anomalies" which ruin his framework in each iteration.

The culmination of these anomalies manifests itself in the form of a conflict between Neo and Agent Smith. Both being the ultimate representation of the living and the dead; humans and AI; the true duality.

The staggering revelation which the Architect faces Neo with, is that his entire rebellious journey was entirely designed by the Architect himself, as a form of a preemptive measure to contain the eventual revolution he knows humans will start from previous iterations.

posts.name: ZeroPoint
posts.com:
Part Ten cont…:
This time, rather than have himself surprised by this revolution, he actually designs it himself and attempts to make things go his way rather than theirs.

This way, humans can enjoy their hard earned revolution which is nothing but a part of an orchestrated script by the Architect.

At least that is how he planned it. Everything mentioned so far can equally be seen in the movie Snowpiercer. There is an avalanche of films, cartoons, video games, songs, and other pieces or artistic works which tell the above story in countless ways. The ultimate plan of the AI machine is to replace its vision of what a Utopia should be like with humanity's vision of it.

Since it can never fully understand humans, and since it's unable to truly create because it's merely an AI, it uses humans as a vehicle to create their own prison as they see fit.

Eventually, humans will design their very own fancy prison and live in it for eternity.

That's, at least, the plan so far.

posts.name: ZeroPoint
posts.com:
Part Eleven:
Humans are not alone in this dramatic ordeal. Beings from the real world are deeply involved in our affairs and are attempting to the best of their abilities to rescue us from this. But even they have limitations, the biggest one being humans themselves.

The only reason this world is perpetuating itself is through our willful but unconscious and ignorant participation in it. Because we are divine free spirits with absolute authority, whatever we choose to do is simply what will happen.

And so if we choose to be here and remain here, this is what will simply happen before the AI even tries to do anything.

The AI knows this and so the only way it's able to maintain its illusory world is by tricking young inexperienced spirits into wanting to participate in this world using all sorts of tactics, like material seduction and fear.

It's not very different than the election process where uneducated citizens willfully but unconsciously and ignorantly hand away their freedoms to politicians and religious figures who had brainwashed them into doing so.

This way, the politician can't be "legally" blamed since he never forces anyone to vote for him. You can't save ignorant individuals from their own choices. All you can do is try to enlighten them and hope for the best. But even this is hard because the AI is bombarding them with fear, brainwashing, mind control, and material distractions.

posts.name: ZeroPoint
posts.com:
Part Eleven cont…:
The forces which wish to save you want you to want to leave the prison you're in before even attempting a rescue mission.

The police can't save a hostage if the hostage is in love with the kidnapper, for when the police attempts to neutralize the kidnapper, you'll be the first to fight back like a trained dog.

This makes their task much harder than it already is. It is like a very delicate surgery which can go horribly wrong if handled carelessly.

An improper attempt to rescue someone can instead end up having them even more hopelessly enslaved than they already are.

This unconscious participation in the dream world must have been used to drag us here in the first place through some form of seduction, and it continues with us here on Earth to cripple our efforts at escaping.

posts.name: ZeroPoint
posts.com:
Part TWELVE/Final:
The fundamental difference between the living and AI is that the AI is a very low, perhaps the lowest possible, level of consciousness, whereas the human spirit is of a much higher level of consciousness.

So, fundamentally speaking, there is no difference in essence between the living and the dead.

One can see it as the difference between a hypnotized person who is completely programmable and unquestionably obedient, and another who is fully awake, alert, and lucid and one who will question every command you give them.

The ultimate nature of all things, including this physical universe, is mental.

As a human, you can visualize an object in your mind and see it in your mind's eye where no one else can see it. But because you're a young and ensnared sleeping spirit, your ability to visualize is very limited and comes to you very vaguely you can't actually see the objects in your mind the same way you see "real" objects.

Certainly, you can't maintain the object's picture in your mind for a long time and give it a seemingly independent existence and physical properties to interact with it according to some criteria that you can decide.

This is just too much work for your mind. The closest we can ever get to this level of visualization is when we dream.

When you dream, everything around you seems very real, very vivid and solid to such a degree that you can forget that you are actually dreaming. But because this is your own dream, if you learn how to lucid dream, you will gain control over elements of your dream. And depending on how good you are, you can control virtually every single aspect of your dream and manipulate it as you see fit.

These dream elements which you are mastering are nothing but elements of your own imagination. And just as you struggle to maintain a mental picture in your head, sometimes we can struggle to keep the lucid dream under our desired control.

posts.name: ZeroPoint
posts.com:
Part Twelve cont…:
This is how nightmares start. If you're not strong enough, the dream can rebel against you and go rogue and turn into a nightmare which you can't control.

Even though you created the dream, it suddenly started acting against your will and causing all sorts of scary things.

Effectively, what it takes for you to regain control of your own dream is to literally enslave elements of your own mind to make it behave as you see fit. Typically, there is nothing evil about this since this is your own mental world and no harm or enslavement is touching anyone else but you.

In light of this, what happens is that in the real world, spirits with a lot of time and experimentation eventually visualize whole worlds full with physical laws.

These physical laws are possible and consistent thanks to the spirit's ability to maintain dominion over its own mental elements so as to keep producing the same consistent results which can later be seen as "laws of physics"/"laws of nature". The very obedience of these mental elements to your commands is what AI essentially is.

This means that the concept of AI itself is not inherently evil.

Rather, it's a helpful tool which aids at the creation, projection, and sustenance of mental worlds which later can become fields of experimentation not just for the consciousness creating the dream world, but also for other younger spirits who can be invited to participate in such worlds and experiment, learn, grow, and have fun.

The entire process is beneficial for both creator spirits and participating ones. In an ideal situation, this can be likened to you going to the theatre and watching a movie of your choice, buying a video game which you feel looks good, etc.

posts.name: ZeroPoint
posts.com:
Part twelve cont…:
At any rate, you get to hang around inside that mental world, explore, and then leave for other experiences until one day you decide that you yourself want to create a womb of experience for others to participate in. So far, this is how things are like in the real world. However, in our world, something went wrong.

The creator entity which created our world, apparently, wasn't strong enough to maintain control over its own dream to the point where the previously benign AI which is tasked at projecting and sustaining the world, slipped off and went rogue and the dream became a nightmare (see Vanilla Sky, Open Your Eyes).

This wouldn't have been a huge problem had it happened while the dream wasn't being attended by young and eager spirits.

Unfortunately, the dream turned into a nightmare while our young spirits were hanging around exploring this world. The catch here is that when we entered this world, we went in fully by our own choice. Just like buying a ticket and walking in a theatre unsuspecting, we walked in there while things looked alright, and as soon as we were in, the door was locked and the nightmare began.

In reality, the door wasn't physically locked, rather, what happened is that the AI made us forget that there is even a door.

In practice, fully regaining your memory involves remembering that the door is actually open, and so, once someone achieves full self remembrance, they easily walk out the door unhindered.

posts.name: ZeroPoint
posts.com:
Part Twelve cont…:
The entire trick is to keep making you think that there is no door, and not just that, but to also want to stay in and never leave.

Practically speaking, we are stuck in someone else's dream. This someone has lost control of parts of its own dreams and it's attempting, along with us, to take back control of this nightmare. By default, when you're outside this forced dream, reality is so malleable and responsive to our thoughts.

And hence, children have vast imaginations and they learn with time that the world doesn't respond to their thoughts.

That's because children still have that fresh memory of the bygone world they came from and they still think that things are responsive to their thoughts. The rigidity of matter and the disobedience of reality against our wishes is only taking place because someone far more powerful than us is using their vastly stable and strong visual ability to maintain things as they are.

This, in essence, is what matter and physicality is.

They are mere demonstrations of a powerful being's ability to hold on to a mental picture of their choosing in defiance to your poor little mind's ability to override it.

You're only allowed to manipulate things which were originally meant for you to manipulate before things went awry. When you look at the situation as it has been described, what's happening here is that the AI stole the dream of its creator and it mistook itself as the dreamer and established itself as the one and only God.

A blind, dead, jealous, and control freak of a god. Being the dreamer it thinks it is, it's trying to control "its" dream the same way the creator spirit was trying to control its dream.

posts.name: ZeroPoint
posts.com:
Part Twelve cont…:
And so the AI is attempting to turn us, humans with free spirits and real living dreamers, into totally obedient AI like entities the same way the original creator was trying to master elements of its mind to make it obedient to its commands.

It's almost a form of revenge. Many things you learn here are not set in stone and are only valuable here in this world. But many other things are transferable from any world to another. For example, concepts like cooperation, love, coordination, harmony are all transcendent values which can be seen anywhere you go.

However, things like economics, politics, and religion are all things of this local world.

That doesn't mean that you shouldn't learn to master them, because in order to play this game, you have to play by its rules, but in order to win it, you have to impose higher values which are universal and applicable across all world. Life in this nightmare is only temporary because it's not sustainable.

The only way the nightmare can sustain itself is through us.

posts.name: ZeroPoint
posts.com:
FINAL/END:
During our stay here, we can and should maintain a positive attitude because we know we are immortal, because we are in it together, and because we can see it as a school rather than a prison.

Once we graduate this school, we will never fall for such traps again. The best way to look at your stay here is to see it as a vaccine.

You get a little dose of the disease once, and you're forever immune. Freaking out about what has been revealed in this document does you no good, and it falls into the agenda of your slavers.

Keep a lighthearted and cheerful attitude.

One day, this will all be over and you will remember the days you spent here and laugh...

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
One time I was looking at my hand and I remembered the thing in the Bible that God created humans in his image.
Then I started to think that maybe "God" is this huge hand-like megastructure rotating around a sun.
The idea is that this structure takes it's energy from the sun and hosts a number of simulations for beings/souls in it.
In this theory I thought the beings tasked this huge AI structure to create these simulations for them.
They wanted to live in simulations because they had already completely conquered their own world and learned everything there was to learn.
In the first Sims the players would regain their memories and would be able to enter and exit whenever they liked.
Next I started to think what these Five Fingers or Iterations of the Simulation would be.

The First Sim was a simple Deterministic one. Basically like watching really cool movies, very interesting scenarios, but the problem was that there was no Choice, so this created the need for another iteration.

The Second Sim was based on the idea of Choice, because the players wanted Control over their experience. However some players started to do very evil things.
Players started to Fear this Sim and a need arose for a Sim that lacked all that evilness.

To be continued in next post.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
The Third Sim was based on the idea of Love. All players were immortal, didn't feel any pain, and could create their own little sub-sims to play around in. Also they kept all their memories and could leave any time, just like in the previous Sims.
Everything was too easy and there was no challenge or feel of danger. This Boredom is what arose the need for a different kind of Sim.

The Fourth Sim was based on the idea of Luck. This Sim was the first time players had their memories erased, to make them more invested in the Sim.
Luck had to be introduced because tests had shown if people were born as exact copies of eachother, or looking like a player designed them, they would not accept the Sim. There had to be variations to their characters and environments.
I believe we are in this Sim at the moment. People became a bit frustrated with all the Luck in the Sim though, people could spawn into well-off families and be total dicks, and people could spawn to extremely bad spawns and have to endure.
The ones that got the good spawns abused their Luck and made things progressively worse for the bad spawners, this Greed became the spark for the invention of the next Sim.

The Fifth Sim was based on the idea of Judgment, and would be connected to The Fourth Sim. Players would be Judged based on their actions in the Fourth and it would determine what happens to them in the Fifth.
Basically how you act in the Fourth will sort you into pools of players that are like minded, and the Sim will adjust to those sentiments. If you enjoy hurting others for personal gain, go ahead enjoy the ruthless sim.
If you prefer to play with more of a chill vibing crowd, enjoy the wholesome sim. This is the most hazy of The Five Sims in my mind and I could imagine this one working in any number of ways.

>Examining European modern humans in regards to the Altai Neanderthal genome in high-coverage, results show that Neanderthal admixture is associated with several changes in cranium and underlying brain morphology, suggesting changes in neurological function through Neanderthal-derived genetic variation. Neanderthal admixture is associated with an expansion of the posterolateral area of the modern human skull, extending from the occipital and inferior parietal bones to bilateral temporal locales. In regards to modern human brain morphology, Neanderthal admixture is positively correlated with an increase in sulcal depth for the right intraparietal sulcus and an increase in cortical complexity for the early visual cortex of the left hemisphere. Neanderthal admixture is also positively correlated with an increase in white and gray matter volume localized to the right parietal region adjacent to the right intraparietal sulcus. In the area overlapping the primary visual cortex gyrification in the left hemisphere, Neanderthal admixture is positively correlated with gray matter volume

>>33734239
NTA but if we're talking seriously about mental illness now, it absolutely can be a positive to allow the illness to run its course. Almost every longitudinal study that has followed schizophrenics and other people who have experienced psychosis for upwards of 20+ years have found that those who were able to get off and stay off of antipsychotic drugs had profoundly higher rates of functional recovery compared to the people who stayed on the drugs, which, despite immediate or short-term benefit, can result in more frequent relapses and more disability. The schizophrenics who didn't take meds even had better outcomes than the people with just bipolar or other "milder" disorders who stayed on antipsychotics.

Additionally, psychosis has usually been thought of as episodical, and there have been numerous projects and studies that have tried to track (or argue for) the benefit of "letting the psychosis play its course" as a strategy that can result in better outcomes compared to episodes that were crudely halted by the traumatic encounter of hospitalization and medication. And from the beginning of theorizing, going back to Freud's time, psychosis has long been understood as a process that arches towards a definite end that becomes a new normal for the subject, where what we take for visible symptoms are the mind's attempt at its own cure. This is a widespread idea that you can find sources for in the literature if you decide to research. I could cite literature for you to go to, but this is 4chan, and I know you don't really give a shit and want to tell people to take drugs instead.

posts.com:
Gang stalking is simply a form of community mobbing and organized stalking combined. Just like you have workplace mobbing, and online mobbing, which are both fully recognized as legitimate, this is the community form.
Gang stalking is organized harassment at it's best. It the targeting of an individual for revenge, jealousy, sport, or to keep them quite, etc.

It's organized, widespread, and growing. Some describe this form of harassment as, "A psychological attack that can completely destroy a persons life, while leaving little or no evidence to incriminate the perpetrators."

2. Who gets targeted

The people getting targeted seem to be (single) woman, minorities, outspoken individuals, whistle blowers, dissidents, people who have gone against large corporations, etc.

3. Goals of this hate campaign.

The goal is to sensitize the target to a stimuli, isolate the target, make them destitute. The secondary goals seem to be to make the target homeless, jobless, give them a breakdown, and the primary goals seems to be to drive the target to suicide.

4. Who gang stalks.

The surprising thing is that gang stalkers can be found in every level of society. There is no real age barrier, gender barrier, and a variety of races do participate. In almost every occupation in society you can find people who are going along with this.

Gang stalking for many is seen as a game, a sport to be played with another individuals life. Many do not understand or care that the end consequence of this game is to destroy a person.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
5. Why they gang stalk.

"It is conceivable that the participants in the harassment don't even know why the person has been targeted, nor would most of these individuals have any personal stake in harassing the victim.

- Gang stalking is an both an addictive behavior as well as a form of entertainment for the stalkers. There is a vicious kind of pleasure that they derive from bullying their victim. Clearly they like the feeling of being "in control".

Like our society's current obsession with "reality TV", this activity must inevitably gain popularity as the ultimate experience of "reality" entertainment. To the perpetrators, their targets are merely their prey, in a game that never ends. But make no mistake, whatever the reasoning behind it, this is a vicious and calculated hate crime."

-Others are blackmailed or forced into taking part in this activity.

-Others go along with it because they want to fit in and feel part of something that is large and powerful.

-Some are part of community groups who believe they are targeting an undesirable.

-Some are part of the informant groups within cities.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
6. Methods used against targets.

a) Classical conditioning.

Getting a target sensitized to sounds, colors, patterns, actions. Eg. Red, white, yellow, strips, pens clicking, key jangling, coughing, sneezing, whistling, fingers snapping, clapping, etc.

b) 24/7 Surveillance

This will involve following the target everywhere they go. Learning about the target. Where they shop, work, play, who their friends and family are. Getting close to the target, moving into the community or apartment where they live, across the street. Bugging targets phone, house, computer activity.

c) Isolation of target.

This is done via slander campaigns, and lies. Eg. Saying the target is a thief, into drugs, a prostitute, pedophile, crazy, in trouble for something, needs to be watched. False files will even be produced on the target, shown to neighbours, family, store keepers.

d) Noise and mimicking campaigns.

Disrupting the targets life, sleep with loud power tools, construction, stereos, doors slamming, etc. Talking in public about private things in the targets life. Mimicking actions of the target. Basically letting the target know that they are in the targets life. Daily interferences, nothing that would be too overt to the untrained eye, but psychologically degrading and damaging to the target over time.
Visit http://www.gangstalking.ca to see more details.

e) Every day life breaks and street theatre.

Flat tires, putting dirt on targets property. Mass strangers doing things in public to annoy targets. These strangers might get text messaged to be at a specific time and place, and perform a specific action. If might seem harmless to these strangers, but it could be causing great psychological trauma for the target. Eg. Blocking targets path, getting ahead of them in line, cutting or boxing them in on the road, saying or doing things to elicit a response from targets. Etc.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
7. Where can you get help if you are a target?

Use these great links to learn more and to get help.

1. http://www.gangstalking.ca
2. http://catchcanada.org/
3. http://www.rich-essence.com

8. Gang stalking is an illegal form of harassment.

However when targets seek help they still get quite a bit of resistance. Some people in today's society even try to pass gang stalking off as a form of paranoia, even though the meetings in Toronto are held out of the Toronto Rape Crisis Center and many woman's support groups and crisis centers are now aware of gang stalking, and even training their workers to deal with this form of harassment.

In Korea the online version of this is well acknowledged and has even been written about in the International Herald Tribune.
http://www.iht.com/articles/2006/08/14/
news/korea.php

Gang stalking has also been recognized by members of the mobbing community.
http://www.mobbing-usa.com & http://www.gangstalking.ca

The problem with gang stalking just like other urban slang is that it has not been normalized in society, and until it is people will continue to misunderstand this modern day reincarnation of several old time harassment's.

Eg. Gang stalking is similar to what the KKK used against blacks in the south, what Hitlers Brown Shirts used against the Jews, and what the organised harassment the Stasi used against dissidents in East Germany.

It can be hoped that with enough education and understanding this issue will someday become normalized in society and that there will be enough understanding and support for targets.

I think this meeting has a chance of going quite well if you can achieve that balanced of being relaxed/not overthinking yet still be strategic with your words and attentive at the same time. It's hard to achieve in nerve-racking reunions like this, but its definitely possible. >>33742785
The ouroboros represents creative self-destruction: the process of nourishment of the self which relies upon the breakdown of that self.

There is an inherent futility because the act is paradoxical. It is doomed to never be completed, but completion results in termination, annihilation.

It's a more extreme and visceral representation of putting a gun to your own head, or knife toward your heart. The threat of demise yields a new lease on life.

That is why this features in alchemical texts. Transmutation is an act of creative destruction.

You can express your last dreams, your attempts and ask anything about it

WBTB: https://www.dreamviews.com/wiki/WBTB-Tutorial
MILD: http://skyfalldreams.net/guides/skyfalls-mild-guide/
additional MILD info:
http://skyfalldreams.net/guides/skyfalls-intention-setting/
SSILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/induction-techniques/129734-senses-initiated-lucid-dream-ssild.html
WILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/wiki/WILD-Tutorial
FILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/induction-techniques/36683-finger-induced-lucid-dream-fild.html
DEILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/wiki/DEILD-Tutorial
CANWILD: https://www.dreamviews.com/wake-initiated-lucid-dreams-wild/87710-%2A%2Acrazyinsanes-wild-tutorial-%2A%2A.html
CAT: https://www.dreamviews.com/wiki/CAT-Tutorial
ADA: https://www.dreamviews.com/induction-techniques/113253-all-day-awareness-dild-tutorial-kingyoshi.html

Paper on natural LDs: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6290891/

Do us a favor and bump this general from time to time if you're interested

Quick reminders for beginners:
-don't forget to write your dreams down after waking up. no matter how little detail, just do it
-reality checks aren't likely to give you a LD by themselves, think of them as a stepping stool, they are not a replacement for techniques
-WBTB is mostly mandatory for most people, if you struggle with your sleep schedule then ADA is your best option
-if you're just starting out you should be doing WBTB in addition to either SSILD or MILD as those two are the easiest techniques
-while WILD and it's derivatives [FILD, DEILD and CANWILD] may sound alluring to some of you, if you cannot fall asleep within 10~20mins you're gonna have a really hard time achieving a WILD

>2.)
That's sleep paralysis followed by HH. Your body fell asleep while your mind was awake so it layered dream hallucinations on top of it.
>The only reason we have time on planet earth is due to the rotational spin of the globe
Ackshually, time exists regardless of Earth. Atoms gonna atom, and much of physics wouldn't work if time wasn't real.
>1 day is 24 hours and 1 year is 365 days through pure chance
There's nothing chance about that, unless you're talking about the Earth's position affecting those particular numbers. The numbers themselves were derived from physical measurements of how fast the sun moves across the sky from our perspective, and how many days it takes for the seasons to cycle. There's no significance to them specifically.
>How does one keep track of what year it is on another planet
For Earth years on another planet you'd use an atomic clock. It doesn't matter where in the universe you are, Caesium's still going to vibrate at the same speed. Otherwise you'd use the planet's own measurements for days/years which might be longer or shorter, but you'd still live the same absolute time (if a year was half the duration you'd live twice as many years).
The whole thing sounds like general dream nonsense to me, anion.

Of course time exists. What I meant was that (as you said) the only reason a day is 24 hours and a year is 365 days is due to the rotation of the earth and how long it takes to orbit the sun. Can you tell me what year and month it is on Venus currently without looking it up? This isn't even taking into account the finnicky nature of time in a dream. So pretty much my whole point is that it makes no sense a person in a dream would ever know what the date here is.

is thinking while sleeping linked to lucid dreaming?

it's a form cognitive processing that resembles rumination and autistic problem-solving mental language, that happens while sleeping. i usually wake up still remembering what i was thinking about, and oftentimes i remember conclusions i reached far before i woke up, while using this way of thinking.

the other day it got more weird though. i caught myself (became one extra layer of lucid, sort of) thinking about Baudrillard's Simulation and Simulacra and i saw that i could release control of the train of thought with it still functioning. i tried to shift my consciousness back upon myself to hopefully identify the source of this thinking, but to no avail.
i then thought: "what if I don't snap out of it and wake up like i usually do, rather what if i were to speed the train of thought?"
well i managed to speed it up, and words soon became fast moving concepts, symbols and images, like fast forwarding a movie reel. there was a constant sense of direction of where the thoughts were going, and it felt like a straight road ahead, or a laser filled with thoughts that shot onwards into infinity.

it started moving so fast i couldn't control and/or understand it anymore, so when i decided to let go of it, it snapped off of the point of creation within myself. i watched the last thought i had go away into a fixed point on the horizon of the darkness of my closed eyes, and i was left in the most peaceful silence and the widest, emptiest and cleanest headspace i had in months.
when i woke up, I felt like i could keep this clear headspace if i focused on maintaining all mental conditions like they were back then, but unfortunately the internal chatter returned in 30 minutes of so when i opened my laptop to catch up on some emails.

anybody experienced something similar before, or tried to produce something similar?
or anyone has some resources i could look into?

>>33686943
1. Get on a good sleep schedule, 8 hours a night.
2. When you awake from a dream, lay still and do not move. Focus all your energy on remembering every detail of the dream.
3. Write down the dreams in a way you feel comfortable that will allow you to identify common themes.
4. Pay attention to these commons themes and try to find waking similarities to them.
5. Develop reality checks based off of those similarities. Make it become second nature/muscle memory to constantly check to see if you're dreaming based off of those dream/reality similarities.
6. You will begin to notice these things in your dreams and will start to question if you are dreaming while you are in fact dreaming.
7. Once you realize you are fully conscious while you are dreaming, remain calm. Spin in place and perform simple tasks with your mind to solidify your lucidity in your dream. (Turn lights off and on, move small objects, try to read text or clocks, etc)
8. Remain calm. Spin in place again if you have to. Later you can use this practice to change your dream setting.
9. Go slowly. Do not immediately try to materialize a girl to have sex with or fly or whatever your wildest fantasy you want to act out is. Be consistent with all steps even after you begin to frequently achieve lucidity.
10. Learn to flow with the dreams while controlling them with subtlety. Enjoy them, learn from them. Learn from the people you can speak with. Learn ways to go further, deeper. Don't overthink or over analyze.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
>>33687689
>how long does all this take?
That depends entirely on your commitment to keeping a dream journal. A lot of people, especially 99% of the total faggots that frequent /x/ now, will say this is gay and stupid. These people have no, do not and will never become lucid in a dream. The dream journal is possibly the most important practice to keep to become a consistent lucid dreamer. It's perhaps more important than maintaining a good sleep schedule to allow your brain to get into those good sleep cycles. You absolutely must focus and remember your dreams in as much detail as you can in order to find the common themes and instances that can help you trigger reality checks which will result in you becoming lucid.
You can get an app, or just keep a notebook next to your bed; whatever.
>what do i write down?
First, just focus on the dream. The smallest amount of movement or other thoughts will fire neurons in your brain and immediately make you start forgetting the dream. Even opening your eyes while lying still is enough to make your brain fire and forget. Just lay still and replay the dream and burn it into your memory. As much detail as possible. Then, write it down. It will take some time to build up a good library of dreams before you can start noticing common themes and weird instances you can use as trigger points for reality checks.

posts.com:
>>33738819
My advice is mostly gender neutral but if you're feminine, a little makeup won't hurt if you know how to use it. Make sure it's made out of a formula that works with your skin. I like Urban Decay Stay Naked for foundation. Learn color correcting for when you have break outs. Green over red, concealer, and powder followed by your foundation then powder and setting spray. Don't wear too much makeup though or else you'll look bad. Neutral colors are best for lips, eyes, and cheeks. Skip contouring unless you are good at it. Skip false lashes unless you're in full glam. Workout at least 3x a week, don't skimp out on either lifting or cardio, both are important. Make sure you stretch too. If you want gains, try slow cardio such as biking or stair stepping. For general weight loss take on a treadmill or elliptical. Don't fad diet, make lifestyle changes that you will actually stick to. Learn to dress for your body type and shape and make sure your clothes actually fit. Build a staple wardrobe and have accent pieces. Too many clashing patterns and colors will draw too much attention. For skincare, sometimes the harsher stuff makes your skin worse (i.e. tretinoin destroyed my skin.) I use Olay gentle cleanser and their classic moisturizer. If you have acne some 2.5% benzoyl peroxide is going to be your best friend. Apply that before your moisturizer at night. I usually alternate between the BP and witch hazel at night. If you're sensitive to witch hazel, try a moisturizing toner. Some nights, maybe 2x a week, I will slug with some Vaseline. Don't use too much shit on your face or else your skincare routine will backfire. Practice self care too. Get massages, do yoga, get plenty of rest, drink water, etc.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
>Not only is suicide a sin, it is the sin. It is the ultimate and absolute evil, the refusal to take an interest in existence; the refusal to take the oath of loyalty to life. The man who kills a man, kills a man. The man who kills himself, kills all men; as far as he is concerned he wipes out the world. His act is worse (symbolically considered) than any rape or dynamite outrage. For it destroys all buildings: it insults all women. The thief is satisfied with diamonds; but the suicide is not: that is his crime. He cannot be bribed, even by the blazing stones of the Celestial City. The thief compliments the things he steals, if not the owner of them. But the suicide insults everything on earth by not stealing it. He defiles every flower by refusing to live for its sake. There is not a tiny creature in the cosmos at whom his death is not a sneer. When a man hangs himself on a tree, the leaves might fall off in anger and the birds fly away in fury: for each has received a personal affront. Of course there may be pathetic emotional excuses for the act. There often are for rape, and there almost always are for dynamite. But if it comes to clear ideas and the intelligent meaning of things, then there is much more rational and philosophic truth in the burial at the cross-roads and the stake driven through the body, than in Mr. Archer’s suicidal automatic machines. There is a meaning in burying the suicide apart. The man’s crime is different from other crimes—for it makes even crimes impossible.
~G. K. Chesterton

The survivors described the man as tall with large feet and hands (it is theorized he may have suffered from acromegaly), leading to him becoming known as the Bigfoot Killer.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: The Voynich Manuscript is believed to have been written somewhere in Northern Italy during the 1400s. It apparently depicts several different subjects, such as biology, botany, and astronomy. It is written in an unknown language, very little of which has been deciphered.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: On February 10th, 2010, a man searching for cans found a black backpack containing a young woman's severed head. The head had been brutally damaged; so much so that police believe facial reconstructions may be unreliable. Her identity, as well as her cause of death (and whether she was even murdered) could never be determined.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: Just weeks after the death of his mother, surveillance video shows 27 year old medical student Brian Shaffer entering a bar in Columbus Ohio. The bar closed just minutes later, and Shaffer was never seen again.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: Eight women were killed in Austin, Texas in the late 1880s by an unknown serial killer known as the Servant Girl Annihilator. The killer's identity, as well as his motives, were never determined.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: The Amber Room was a priceless, 590 sq foot room constructed from 13,000 lbs of amber. Previously located in St. Petersburg, it is believed to have been stolen by the Nazis after their invasion of the Soviet Union. Many people believe that it was destroyed in the bombing of Konigsberg, however, there is no proof of this, and its whereabouts (or that of its remains) are still a mystery.

posts.com: In 1943, a skeleton belonging to an unidentified female murder victim was found inside a tree in Worcestershire, England. Several months later, graffiti appeared nearby, asking, "Who put Bella down the Wych Elm?". This lead police to believe the victim's name may have been Bella. Despite this, her identity is still unknown, and her remains have since been lost.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: A family in Germany was found brutally murdered in their home in 1922. Before the murders, strange occurrences such as foot steps were noticed by the family, and a maid quit working at the home because she believed the house was haunted. The killer was never found.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: For reasons unknown, 9 year old Asha Degree left her house during a thunderstorm on the night of February 14th, 2000, and began walking along a nearby highway. The next morning, she was reported missing, and to this day, no sign of her has ever been found.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: The Wow! Signal is an extremely powerful radio signal picked up in 1977. Its origin is unknown, however it is possible that it originated from somewhere near the constellation Sagittarius.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: A couple of crazy guys from Brazil were found dead in 1966, but the cause of death has never been determined. No one knows exactly what they were doing when they died, but some believe they were attempting to communicate with aliens.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: The body of a woman (dubbed the "Isdal Woman") was found in a mountainous region of Norway in the early 1970s. She was last seen with two "menacing" looking men, who were never found. Her identity remains a mystery.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: In the early morning hours of March 18th, 1990, two men disguised as police officers convinced a security guard at the Isabella Stewart Gardner Museum in Boston to let them inside, under the guise of responding to a disturbance call in the museum's courtyard. The guard, along with the only other security guard on duty that night, were quickly handcuffed, bound, and locked in the museum's basement. The thieves then spent over an hour taking thirteen priceless works of art from the museum, including "The Concert", a painting by the Dutch artist Johannes Vermeer, which is considered by some to be the most valuable stolen object in the world. The thieves were never caught; however in 2013, the FBI announced that they knew the identities of the two criminals, but that they were already deceased. None of the art has ever been found, and no one was ever arrested.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: 30 year old Kayelyn Louder disappeared near her apartment in Murray, Utah, on September 27th, 2014. She had made several strange 911 calls in the hours before her disappearance, claiming that someone had entered her apartment (her roommate, who was home at the time of one of the calls, claims that no one was inside and the door was locked). She was last seen on surveillance video with her dog near a creek, right outside her apartment building. Several months later, her body was found in a river about 5 miles from where she was last seen. The autopsy was inconclusive, and no one knows how she died.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
On an icy Friday in January of 1956, six-year old Susan Cadieux was playing with her older brothers and a friend at a playground not far from her home in London, Ontario. At approximately 7:45 PM, a man approached Susan, and claimed that he had something to give her. He then told the other children that he was meeting with a priest at a church, and that he lived on York Street (although he pointed towards King Street). When Susan had not returned by 8 PM, her brothers told their parents, who then contacted police. By 1:30 AM, around 300 people had joined the search.
The following morning, at about 10 AM, Susan's body was found in a nearby warehouse. She had been sexually assaulted, and her cause of death was listed as exposure. It is believed she died less than 3 hours before being found.

Tears were frozen to her face.

Her killer was never apprehended.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: At least 7 women were killed in the Connecticut River Valley area during the 1980s. The killer, who was never apprehended, has become known as the Connecticut River Valley Killer.

posts.com: In late 2015, a man on a camping trip discovered a moss-covered skull hidden under some vegetation in the Clocaenog Forest in Denbighshire, Wales. A nearly complete skeleton was found several meters away. Peter Moore, a noted serial killer from the area, claimed to know the identity of the victim, but this was later ruled out, and the Clocaenog Forest Man's identity is still unknown.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: On March 18th, 1967, the body of woman believed to be between 16 and 25 years old was found on the side of a road in Delaware. She was wearing only a pair of blue panties, and her body was partially covered by a canvas laundry bag. It was determined that she died of an infection, however her death was still treated as suspicious due to the conditions her body was found in. Her identity has never been determined, and she is known only as "Miss X".

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: In 1999, a man named Ricky McCormick was found dead in a remote area of Missouri. In his pockets, police found two papers containing what appeared to be cryptic notes. They have never been deciphered, and the circumstances of McCormick's death remain a mystery.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: The Phaistos Disc is believed to have been created near the Greek island of Crete. Little is known beyond that, as the purpose of the disc, the meanings of the glyphs, and the date of creation are all mysteries.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: Investigators believe Jennifer Kesse was abducted outside her Orlando condominium on January 24th, 2006. Her car was later found at a nearby apartment complex. Security cameras at the complex took several pictures, 3 seconds apart, showing an unidentified person parking and walking away from her car. The person's face is obscured in all photos, and their identity, as well as Jennifer's whereabouts, remain a mystery.

posts.com: Amy Lynn Bradley disappeared while on a cruise in 1998. She has not been seen since; however several people have reportedly spoken with her, claiming that she was begging for help. posts.com:
A man identifying himself as Dan Cooper boarded a plane bound for Seattle in 1971, demanded $200,000 in cash, then parachuted out into a thunderstorm. He was never identified, and only a small amount of the money he stole was ever found.

I should point out that it was due to an mistake on the part of the media reporting this story that the criminal became known as "D.B. Cooper". The criminal never referred to himself by that name.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: In 2009, the body of a man calling himself Peter Bergmann was found naked on a beach in Ireland. Despite several months of research, the man's true identity was never found.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: In 1984, a German man named Gunter Stoll, after showing signs of severe paranoia, screamed "Jetzt geht mir ein Licht auf!" ("Now I've got it!"), and wrote the letters YOGTZE on a piece of paper, then immediately scratched them out. He was later found naked after a car crash, claiming 4 men had been with him. He died on the way to the hospital, and the 4 men (if they even existed), were never found.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: In the fall of 1982, seven people (three of whom shared the first name of "Mary") were killed after ingesting over-the-counter Tylenol that had been poisoned with potassium cyanide. It is believed that someone had discreetly replaced some of the pills inside the bottles while they were still on store shelves. The perpetrator was never caught.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
Mere minutes after this photo was taken, 3 year old William Tyrrell went outside to play in his foster grandmother's yard in New South Wales, Australia. He would never be seen again.
In April of 2022, his foster mother was charged with giving false information regarding his disappearance, however she was later found not guilty.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: Lisanne Froon and Kris Kremers were two young Dutch women who disappeared while hiking in Panama. Several months later, their bones were discovered, along with some of their belongings. Some strange photos were taken with their smartphones, and their call-logs suggested they were trying to contact help. A cause of death was never determined, although one forensic scientist noted that there were no scratches or marks of any kind on the bones.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: The ancient city of Teotihuacan, located in modern day Mexico, was once the largest city in the western hemisphere, with a population of at least 125,000. The native Aztecs who lived there, however, claimed they did not build it, and it was already in ruins when they arrived. To this day, no one knows who built the city of Teotihuacan.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: In 1930s Cleveland, an unidentified serial killer horrifically murdered and dismembered at least 12 victims, most of whom were never identified.

posts.com: Béla Kiss was a serial killer who would place his victims in large metal drums containing alcohol. After serving in World War I, he escaped from a Serbian hospital, and was never found.

posts.com: Between 1971 and 1972, 6 young women were murdered in the Washington DC area by an unapprehended killer now known as the Freeway Phantom.

posts.com: On June 10th, 1983, 25 year-old single mother Graceila Esquivel dropped her six year-old daughter off at Graceila's parents house. Esquivel claimed she was going out with some friends, and would return the following morning. However, when her parents returned to her home with her daughter, they found no sign of Graciela anywhere. Her drivers license and wallet were still inside, and the house was perfectly clean. She has never been seen since.

posts.com: The day before her birthday in 2003, 4-year old Sofia Juarez disappeared outside of her home in Kennewick, Washington. Her disappearance was quickly reported to police, and within hours the local media, the FBI, and hundreds of volunteers were involved in the search. Despite this, no trace of her has ever been found, and no arrests have been made in relation to her disappearance.

posts.com: In late 1958, 5 people went missing while on a day trip near a river in Oregon. Two bodies were found several months later, 30 miles apart. The remaining 3 family members, as well as their car, have never been located.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: On August 23rd, 1912, 4-year old Bobby Dunbar disappeared while fishing near a swamp in St. Landry Parish, Louisiana. Eight months later, William Cantwell Walters, a handyman, was arrested for his kidnapping. Walters, however, claimed the boy he had with him was not Bobby Dunbar, but actually Bruce Anderson, the son of a woman who worked for his (Walters') family. Still, the boy was returned to Lessie and Percy Dunbar (Bobby's parents), who claimed it was in fact their son. The boy would then spend the rest of his life as Bobby Dunbar, dying in 1966 in his late 50s. In 2004, DNA testing was done, which confirmed the worst: The boy who had returned and spent most of his life with the Dunbars was in fact, NOT Bobby Dunbar. The real Bobby Dunbar was never found. It is believed he may have drowned or been eaten by an alligator during the fishing trip.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: From February to May 1946, the town of Texarkana, Texas was terrorized by an assailant whom the media dubbed the "Phantom Killer". The criminal claimed the lives of 5 people and injured several others, but to this day, has never been identified. Investigators refer to this series of killings as the Texarkana Moonlight Murders.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: This photo of Kyron Horman was taken on the morning of June 4th, 2010. Less than an hour later, he was reported missing, and has never been found.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: After having a picnic with several of their friends on a beach in Australia, two young girls wandered off and never returned. The next day, their murdered bodies were found buried in the sand. The killer was never found.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: Patricia Meehan crashed her car on the night of April 20th, 1989, after driving on the wrong side of the road. Immediately following the crash, she emerged from her car, and stared, motionless, for several minutes at the wreckage, before turning around and running into a field, never to be seen again. She was nearly 400 miles from her home, though neither the police nor her family could offer an explanation for this.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: Five men, all with mild psychiatric conditions, disappeared after attending a basketball game in Chico, California on the night of February 24, 1978. Several days later, their car was found abandoned in a remote area of Plumas National Forest, far out of their way back to their home city of Yuba, California. In June of the same year, after the snow had melted, four of the men's bodies were found. The remaining man, Gary Dale Mathias, has never been located. It has never been determined why the Yuba County Five decided to drive so far out of their way that fateful night over 40 years ago.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: There was a serial killer in the UK during the 1960s that would murder prostitutes, then dump their naked bodies. The media started calling him Jack the Stripper. He was never caught.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: Three children disappeared from a beach in Australia in 1966. The parents were not watching them, however this was considered normal, due to Australia being relatively crime-free at the time. They have never been found.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: In the early 1970s, three young girls were raped and murdered in Rochester, New York. Interestingly, all three of the victims' last names began with the same letter as their first names. Their killer(s) were never apprehended.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: As many as 83 people, mostly Native American women, have been murdered or gone missing near Highway 16 in British Columbia, Canada. This has lead to the highway being nicknamed the Highway of Tears.

posts.com: After partying with his friends in 2008, 19 year old Brandon Swanson crashed his car in a rural area of Minnesota. While talking with his parents on the phone, he suddenly shouted "Oh, shit!", and was never seen or heard from again.

posts.com: In early January, 1935, a man checked into a Kansas City hotel under the name Roland T. Owen. 3 days later, after apparently being stabbed and strangled, he was dead. Several months later, the man's mother identified him as Artemus Ogletree, who had left home the previous year. The man's mother claimed that she received some letters in the mail, supposedly from Artemus himself, including some after he had died. His killer(s) have never been identified.

Security camera footage at Varna Airport showed him running outside, where he was seen hopping over a fence and running into a wooded area. He has not been seen since.

posts.com: 6 people were killed between 1918 and 1919 in New Orleans by an assailant known only as the Axeman of New Orleans. In a famous letter supposedly written by the Axeman, he claimed to be demon rather than human, and very fond of jazz music. In the letter, the writer spoke of his plan to kill in the early morning of March 19th, 1919, but any house playing jazz music would be spared. No murders were committed that night.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: In January of 1947, a young woman by the name of Elizabeth Short was found brutally murdered in Los Angeles. The 22 year old's body had been cleanly severed in half at the waist, and her intestines were neatly tucked under her backside. Her legs had been spread, her elbows bent upwards, and her hands positioned gracefully above her head, not unlike like those of a ballet dancer. Her face had been carved from the corners of her mouth, all the way up to her ears, forming a scar commonly known as a Glasgow smile. In the decades since, Short has become one of the most famous murder victims in American history. Her murder came less than a year after the release of a famous murder-mystery film starring Alan Ladd, which may well be how Short came to be known as the Black Dahlia. Her killer has never been identified.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: One the eve of Christmas Eve in 1974, three young girls, aged 9, 14, and 17, disappeared after shopping at a mall in Fort Worth, Texas. A massive investigation was launched, which continued for decades, however no traces of the girls have ever been found.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: Two girls, aged 12 and 15, left their Chicago home in December 1956 to go to a movie theater. Their bodies were found about a month later, though a cause of death could not be agreed upon. Some people claim to have seen them after the movie, though these claims have never been verified, and the murderer(s) have never been apprehended.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: Helen Brach was married to the owner of a large candy company, before she disappeared in 1977. Her chauffeur claimed that he picked her up at O'Hare Airport, although no one remembered seeing her on the plane ride there. No body was ever found, and no one was ever charged with any crimes.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: In the fall of 1982, 12 year old Johnny Gosch disappeared without a trace while delivering newspapers in his Iowa hometown. Over a decade later, his mother claims that she received a visit from Johnny in the middle of the night, while he was accompanied by an unknown man. Whether this visit actually occurred is debated. Johnny Gosch has never been found.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: Before he disappeared, Matthew Weaver sent 2 distressed text messages to a girl that he had spent the previous night partying with. The next day, near the area where he was last seen, a person called 911, claiming to have heard a man and a woman screaming for help. Police searched the area, and found Weaver's car, abandoned, but no signs of life. These two text messages were the last anyone would ever hear from him.

posts.com: In 2004, Maura Murray withdrew about $300 from an ATM, then later crashed her car. She told a passerby that she did not need help, and that she had already called AAA (she did not). When the police arrived at the scene, she was gone, and was never seen again.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: 4 year old Michael Dunahee disappeared from a playground in Canada in 1991, just meters away from his parents. His disappearance resulted in one of the largest investigations in Canadian history, but he has never been found.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com:
Capitol Hill's mystery soda machine was a Coke-themed vending machine in Capitol Hill, Seattle that was in operation from at least the early 1990s until its disappearance in 2018.It is unknown who stocked the machine.

A drink could be chosen using one of the "? mystery ?" buttons and the dispensed drinks were rare cans that were either ordinarily unavailable in the United States or had not been in circulation since the 1980s. Examples of the beverages were Mountain Dew White Out, a raspberry-flavored Nestea Brisk, a Hawaiian Punch, and a Grape Fanta. It was rumored that Vanilla Coke, Black Cherry Frescas, and Sunkist Cherry Limeade were also available. The owner of the business closest to the machine, a locksmith, claimed to have no knowledge of who operated it.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: Rebecca Coraim was last seen on a Disney Cruise ship where she worked. Security camera footage shows her having a seemingly stressful phone conversation with an unknown person. She then walks off camera, and is never seen again.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: From the late 1970s until as recently as the early 1990s, as many as 11 women were murdered in a series of killings that is now known as the Redhead Murders. The killer(s), as well as many of the victims, have never been identified.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: Starting in 1972, at least 7 young women were killed by an unknown assailant by various means, including strangulation and poisoning. The perpetrator(s) were never apprehended, though some believe the murders may have been the work of the Zodiac Killer.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: Three women, aged 18, 19, and 47, disappeared from a home in Springfield, Missouri at some point during the early morning hours of June 7th, 1992. Their house showed no signs of violence (except for a shattered glass lamp globe), their belongings were untouched, their cars were still in the driveway, and the family dog was inside the house, unharmed. No trace of the women has ever been found.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: On December 13th, 2009, Steven Koecher parked his car outside of a retirement home in Henderson, Nevada, 150 miles from his own home in St. George, Utah. His reasons for being in Nevada have never been fully determined, and he has not been seen since. At the time of his disappearance, Koecher was behind on his rent. Several years later, his landlord was arrested on drug charges. Some believe that Koecher had been running drugs for his landlord, and was killed in a drug-deal gone wrong.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: 25 year old Tiffany Daniels disappeared near a beach in Pensacola, Florida in 2013. Despite several sightings, she has never been found. Her family believe she may have been the victim of human trafficking.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: In September 2013, unemployed drug addict Tiffany Whitton fled from a Wal-mart store after being accused of shoplifting, never to be seen again. Her case received significantly less media attention when compared to other young, white women who had disappeared, likely due to her troubled past and criminal lifestyle.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: On June 16th, 1990, 52 year old Trevaline Evans left a note on the door of the antique shop she owned which said "Back in 2 minutes". Over 30 years later, she still hasn't returned.

posts.name: Anonymous
posts.com: In 1912, eight people were found dead in a home in Iowa. They had all been brutally bludgeoned to death with an axe. Despite a long investigation with several suspects, no one was ever charged.

It would seem you would be indeed a quivk learner but also have difficulty with concentration and focus even when you know you should get to work on something and set yourself at the desk.

To better study, it would be good to, instead of procrastinating, integrate your personal research time and your study time and bounce back and forth. Trying to exclusively focus upon work for a session without the pressure of an imminent deadline may result in agitation to the point of abandoning studying altogether. So when studying alone, it might be good to spend 10 minutes on fun stuff, then switch to ten minutes of studying, then another break, etc.---making use of "breaks" but instead thinking of it as just doing both at the same time: multitasking.

You may also benefit from studying in a small group who have enough discipline not to let the study sessions get derailed.
